title: [Control systems] ABB security advisory (AV26-011)
description: On January 7, 2026, ABB published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: WebPro SNMP Card PowerValue  version 1.1.8.k and prior
WebPro SNMP Card PowerValue UL  version 1.1.8.k and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
